circle_intro: These mamas shared what #mamacircle ðŸ’ž means to them. Their words might echo your story, or give you the courage to reach out.
card1_quote: Hello, mamas <3 I'm a proud mum of a beautiful 3-year-old. Being away from family (overseas), it's been a rocky road. Balancing work, marital life and raising a toddler... phew! Aren't we all heroes?
card2_quote: Sometimes we don't know who to ask that â€œsillyâ€ question, or if it's normal to feel what weâ€™re feeling. When your first baby is born, you are also reborn, and lost, and unsure. I felt completely lost. I hope I can pass along the support I received.
card3_quote: Hi mamas my baby is six weeks old and every day is a whirlpool of joy and exhaustion. If you need someone to chat with during a late night feed I'm here.

footer_disclaimer: Mama Circle is a grassroots, self-organized initiative. Use your own judgment and always prioritize safety.
footer_signature: Made with love for all mamas ðŸ’ž
faq_a1: Mama Circle is a grassroots initiative to combat maternal isolation. Mothers use the hashtag #mamacircle ðŸ’ž to signal they're available for support. There's no app, no sign-up, just gentle peer connection.
faq_q2: How do I find support as a new mother?
faq_a2: Search for #mamacircle ðŸ’ž on social media. When you find someone who feels safe, reach out. Send a message, ask a question, or simply say hello. There are no expectations or obligations.
faq_a3: Add #mamacircle ðŸ’ž to your bio. When you meet another mother, you can say: "I'm part of #mamacircle ðŸ’ž, you can always reach out to me if it feels safe for you." Visit our Toolkit for ready-to-share messages and social post ideas.
faq_q4: Is this only for certain locations?
faq_a4: We're worldwide. Mothers connect from Scotland, Portugal, the Netherlands, Brazil, and beyond. The circle is especially welcoming to expat mothers who can feel even more isolated and without a support network.
faq_a5: Completely free. No memberships, fees, or products. This is community-led peer support, nothing more.
faq_q6: What makes this different from other groups?
faq_a6: This is not another to-do on your list, nor another app for you to download. There are no moderators, no approval process. It's self-organized and trust-based. Simply add the hashtag, reach out, be there for one another and you're part of the circle.
